name: Finset.sup_eq_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
⊢ Eq Max.max Union.union
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sup_eq_union : (Max.max : Finset α → Finset α → Finset α) = Union.union :=
  rfl

name: Finset.inf_eq_inter
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
⊢ Eq Min.min Inter.inter
decl:
@[simp]
theorem inf_eq_inter : (Min.min : Finset α → Finset α → Finset α) = Inter.inter :=
  rfl

name: Finset.union_val_nd
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union s t).val (s.val.ndunion t.val)
decl:
theorem union_val_nd (s t : Finset α) : (s ∪ t).1 = ndunion s.1 t.1 :=
  rfl

name: Finset.union_val
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union s t).val (Union.union s.val t.val)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem union_val (s t : Finset α) : (s ∪ t).1 = s.1 ∪ t.1 :=
  ndunion_eq_union s.2

name: Finset.mem_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
a : α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Union.union s t) a) (Or (Membership.mem s a) (Membership.mem t a))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_union : a ∈ s ∪ t ↔ a ∈ s ∨ a ∈ t :=
  mem_ndunion

name: Finset.mem_union_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s : Finset α
a : α
t : Finset α
h : Membership.mem s a
⊢ Membership.mem (Union.union s t) a
decl:
theorem mem_union_left (t : Finset α) (h : a ∈ s) : a ∈ s ∪ t :=
  mem_union.2 <| Or.inl h

name: Finset.mem_union_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
t : Finset α
a : α
s : Finset α
h : Membership.mem t a
⊢ Membership.mem (Union.union s t) a
decl:
theorem mem_union_right (s : Finset α) (h : a ∈ t) : a ∈ s ∪ t :=
  mem_union.2 <| Or.inr h

name: Finset.forall_mem_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
p : α → Prop
⊢ Iff (∀ (a : α), Membership.mem (Union.union s t) a → p a) (And (∀ (a : α), Membership.mem s a → p a) (∀ (a : α), Membership.mem t a → p a))
decl:
theorem forall_mem_union {p : α → Prop} : (∀ a ∈ s ∪ t, p a) ↔ (∀ a ∈ s, p a) ∧ ∀ a ∈ t, p a :=
  ⟨fun h => ⟨fun a => h a ∘ mem_union_left _, fun b => h b ∘ mem_union_right _⟩,
   fun h _ab hab => (mem_union.mp hab).elim (h.1 _) (h.2 _)⟩

name: Finset.not_mem_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
a : α
⊢ Iff (Not (Membership.mem (Union.union s t) a)) (And (Not (Membership.mem s a)) (Not (Membership.mem t a)))
decl: theorem not_mem_union : a ∉ s ∪ t ↔ a ∉ s ∧ a ∉ t := by rw [mem_union, not_or]

name: Finset.coe_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (↑(Union.union s₁ s₂)) (Union.union ↑s₁ ↑s₂)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_union (s₁ s₂ : Finset α) : ↑(s₁ ∪ s₂) = (s₁ ∪ s₂ : Set α) :=
  Set.ext fun _ => mem_union

name: Finset.union_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
hs : HasSubset.Subset s u
a✝ : HasSubset.Subset t u
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Union.union s t) u
decl:
theorem union_subset (hs : s ⊆ u) : t ⊆ u → s ∪ t ⊆ u :=
  sup_le <| le_iff_subset.2 hs

name: Finset.subset_union_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset s₁ (Union.union s₁ s₂)
decl: @[simp] lemma subset_union_left : s₁ ⊆ s₁ ∪ s₂ := fun _ ↦ mem_union_left _

name: Finset.subset_union_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset s₂ (Union.union s₁ s₂)
decl: @[simp] lemma subset_union_right : s₂ ⊆ s₁ ∪ s₂ := fun _ ↦  mem_union_right _

name: Finset.union_subset_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u v : Finset α
hsu : HasSubset.Subset s u
htv : HasSubset.Subset t v
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Union.union s t) (Union.union u v)
decl:
@[gcongr]
theorem union_subset_union (hsu : s ⊆ u) (htv : t ⊆ v) : s ∪ t ⊆ u ∪ v :=
  sup_le_sup (le_iff_subset.2 hsu) htv

name: Finset.union_subset_union_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ t : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset s₁ s₂
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Union.union s₁ t) (Union.union s₂ t)
decl:
@[gcongr]
theorem union_subset_union_left (h : s₁ ⊆ s₂) : s₁ ∪ t ⊆ s₂ ∪ t :=
  union_subset_union h Subset.rfl

name: Finset.union_subset_union_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t₁ t₂ : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset t₁ t₂
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Union.union s t₁) (Union.union s t₂)
decl:
@[gcongr]
theorem union_subset_union_right (h : t₁ ⊆ t₂) : s ∪ t₁ ⊆ s ∪ t₂ :=
  union_subset_union Subset.rfl h

name: Finset.union_comm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union s₁ s₂) (Union.union s₂ s₁)
decl: theorem union_comm (s₁ s₂ : Finset α) : s₁ ∪ s₂ = s₂ ∪ s₁ := sup_comm _ _

name: Finset.instCommutativeUnion
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
⊢ Std.Commutative fun x1 x2 => Union.union x1 x2
decl:
instance : Std.Commutative (α := Finset α) (· ∪ ·) :=
  ⟨union_comm⟩

name: Finset.union_assoc
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ s₃ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union (Union.union s₁ s₂) s₃) (Union.union s₁ (Union.union s₂ s₃))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem union_assoc (s₁ s₂ s₃ : Finset α) : s₁ ∪ s₂ ∪ s₃ = s₁ ∪ (s₂ ∪ s₃) := sup_assoc _ _ _

name: Finset.instAssociativeUnion
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
⊢ Std.Associative fun x1 x2 => Union.union x1 x2
decl:
instance : Std.Associative (α := Finset α) (· ∪ ·) :=
  ⟨union_assoc⟩

name: Finset.union_idempotent
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union s s) s
decl:
@[simp]
theorem union_idempotent (s : Finset α) : s ∪ s = s := sup_idem _

name: Finset.instIdempotentOpUnion
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
⊢ Std.IdempotentOp fun x1 x2 => Union.union x1 x2
decl:
instance : Std.IdempotentOp (α := Finset α) (· ∪ ·) :=
  ⟨union_idempotent⟩

name: Finset.union_subset_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset (Union.union s t) u
⊢ HasSubset.Subset s u
decl:
theorem union_subset_left (h : s ∪ t ⊆ u) : s ⊆ u :=
  subset_union_left.trans h

name: Finset.union_subset_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset (Union.union s t) u
⊢ HasSubset.Subset t u
decl:
theorem union_subset_right {s t u : Finset α} (h : s ∪ t ⊆ u) : t ⊆ u :=
  Subset.trans subset_union_right h

name: Finset.union_left_comm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union s (Union.union t u)) (Union.union t (Union.union s u))
decl:
theorem union_left_comm (s t u : Finset α) : s ∪ (t ∪ u) = t ∪ (s ∪ u) :=
  ext fun _ => by simp only [mem_union, or_left_comm]

name: Finset.union_right_comm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union (Union.union s t) u) (Union.union (Union.union s u) t)
decl:
theorem union_right_comm (s t u : Finset α) : s ∪ t ∪ u = s ∪ u ∪ t :=
  ext fun x => by simp only [mem_union, or_assoc, @or_comm (x ∈ t)]

name: Finset.union_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union s s) s
decl:
theorem union_self (s : Finset α) : s ∪ s = s :=
  union_idempotent s

name: Finset.union_eq_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (Union.union s t) s) (HasSubset.Subset t s)
decl: @[simp] lemma union_eq_left : s ∪ t = s ↔ t ⊆ s := sup_eq_left

name: Finset.left_eq_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq s (Union.union s t)) (HasSubset.Subset t s)
decl: @[simp] lemma left_eq_union : s = s ∪ t ↔ t ⊆ s := by rw [eq_comm, union_eq_left]

name: Finset.union_eq_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (Union.union s t) t) (HasSubset.Subset s t)
decl: @[simp] lemma union_eq_right : s ∪ t = t ↔ s ⊆ t := sup_eq_right

name: Finset.right_eq_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq s (Union.union t s)) (HasSubset.Subset t s)
decl:
@[simp] lemma right_eq_union : s = t ∪ s ↔ t ⊆ s := by rw [eq_comm, union_eq_right]

-- Porting note: replaced `⊔` in RHS

name: Finset.union_congr_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
ht : HasSubset.Subset t (Union.union s u)
hu : HasSubset.Subset u (Union.union s t)
⊢ Eq (Union.union s t) (Union.union s u)
decl:
theorem union_congr_left (ht : t ⊆ s ∪ u) (hu : u ⊆ s ∪ t) : s ∪ t = s ∪ u :=
  sup_congr_left ht hu

name: Finset.union_congr_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
hs : HasSubset.Subset s (Union.union t u)
ht : HasSubset.Subset t (Union.union s u)
⊢ Eq (Union.union s u) (Union.union t u)
decl:
theorem union_congr_right (hs : s ⊆ t ∪ u) (ht : t ⊆ s ∪ u) : s ∪ u = t ∪ u :=
  sup_congr_right hs ht

name: Finset.union_eq_union_iff_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (Union.union s t) (Union.union s u)) (And (HasSubset.Subset t (Union.union s u)) (HasSubset.Subset u (Union.union s t)))
decl:
theorem union_eq_union_iff_left : s ∪ t = s ∪ u ↔ t ⊆ s ∪ u ∧ u ⊆ s ∪ t :=
  sup_eq_sup_iff_left

name: Finset.union_eq_union_iff_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (Union.union s u) (Union.union t u)) (And (HasSubset.Subset s (Union.union t u)) (HasSubset.Subset t (Union.union s u)))
decl:
theorem union_eq_union_iff_right : s ∪ u = t ∪ u ↔ s ⊆ t ∪ u ∧ t ⊆ s ∪ u :=
  sup_eq_sup_iff_right

name: Finset.inter_val_nd
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s₁ s₂).val (s₁.val.ndinter s₂.val)
decl:
theorem inter_val_nd (s₁ s₂ : Finset α) : (s₁ ∩ s₂).1 = ndinter s₁.1 s₂.1 :=
  rfl

name: Finset.inter_val
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s₁ s₂).val (Inter.inter s₁.val s₂.val)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem inter_val (s₁ s₂ : Finset α) : (s₁ ∩ s₂).1 = s₁.1 ∩ s₂.1 :=
  ndinter_eq_inter s₁.2

name: Finset.mem_inter
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
a : α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Inter.inter s₁ s₂) a) (And (Membership.mem s₁ a) (Membership.mem s₂ a))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_inter {a : α} {s₁ s₂ : Finset α} : a ∈ s₁ ∩ s₂ ↔ a ∈ s₁ ∧ a ∈ s₂ :=
  mem_ndinter

name: Finset.mem_of_mem_inter_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
a : α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
h : Membership.mem (Inter.inter s₁ s₂) a
⊢ Membership.mem s₁ a
decl:
theorem mem_of_mem_inter_left {a : α} {s₁ s₂ : Finset α} (h : a ∈ s₁ ∩ s₂) : a ∈ s₁ :=
  (mem_inter.1 h).1

name: Finset.mem_of_mem_inter_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
a : α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
h : Membership.mem (Inter.inter s₁ s₂) a
⊢ Membership.mem s₂ a
decl:
theorem mem_of_mem_inter_right {a : α} {s₁ s₂ : Finset α} (h : a ∈ s₁ ∩ s₂) : a ∈ s₂ :=
  (mem_inter.1 h).2

name: Finset.mem_inter_of_mem
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
a : α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
a✝¹ : Membership.mem s₁ a
a✝ : Membership.mem s₂ a
⊢ Membership.mem (Inter.inter s₁ s₂) a
decl:
theorem mem_inter_of_mem {a : α} {s₁ s₂ : Finset α} : a ∈ s₁ → a ∈ s₂ → a ∈ s₁ ∩ s₂ :=
  and_imp.1 mem_inter.2

name: Finset.inter_subset_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s₁ s₂) s₁
decl: @[simp] lemma inter_subset_left : s₁ ∩ s₂ ⊆ s₁ := fun _ ↦ mem_of_mem_inter_left

name: Finset.inter_subset_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s₁ s₂) s₂
decl: @[simp] lemma inter_subset_right : s₁ ∩ s₂ ⊆ s₂ := fun _ ↦ mem_of_mem_inter_right

name: Finset.subset_inter
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ u : Finset α
a✝¹ : HasSubset.Subset s₁ s₂
a✝ : HasSubset.Subset s₁ u
⊢ HasSubset.Subset s₁ (Inter.inter s₂ u)
decl:
theorem subset_inter {s₁ s₂ u : Finset α} : s₁ ⊆ s₂ → s₁ ⊆ u → s₁ ⊆ s₂ ∩ u := by
  simp +contextual [subset_iff, mem_inter]

name: Finset.coe_inter
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (↑(Inter.inter s₁ s₂)) (Inter.inter ↑s₁ ↑s₂)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_inter (s₁ s₂ : Finset α) : ↑(s₁ ∩ s₂) = (s₁ ∩ s₂ : Set α) :=
  Set.ext fun _ => mem_inter

name: Finset.union_inter_cancel_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter (Union.union s t) s) s
decl:
@[simp]
theorem union_inter_cancel_left {s t : Finset α} : (s ∪ t) ∩ s = s := by
  rw [← coe_inj, coe_inter, coe_union, Set.union_inter_cancel_left]

name: Finset.union_inter_cancel_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter (Union.union s t) t) t
decl:
@[simp]
theorem union_inter_cancel_right {s t : Finset α} : (s ∪ t) ∩ t = t := by
  rw [← coe_inj, coe_inter, coe_union, Set.union_inter_cancel_right]

name: Finset.inter_comm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s₁ s₂) (Inter.inter s₂ s₁)
decl:
theorem inter_comm (s₁ s₂ : Finset α) : s₁ ∩ s₂ = s₂ ∩ s₁ :=
  ext fun _ => by simp only [mem_inter, and_comm]

name: Finset.inter_assoc
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ s₃ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter (Inter.inter s₁ s₂) s₃) (Inter.inter s₁ (Inter.inter s₂ s₃))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem inter_assoc (s₁ s₂ s₃ : Finset α) : s₁ ∩ s₂ ∩ s₃ = s₁ ∩ (s₂ ∩ s₃) :=
  ext fun _ => by simp only [mem_inter, and_assoc]

name: Finset.inter_left_comm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ s₃ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s₁ (Inter.inter s₂ s₃)) (Inter.inter s₂ (Inter.inter s₁ s₃))
decl:
theorem inter_left_comm (s₁ s₂ s₃ : Finset α) : s₁ ∩ (s₂ ∩ s₃) = s₂ ∩ (s₁ ∩ s₃) :=
  ext fun _ => by simp only [mem_inter, and_left_comm]

name: Finset.inter_right_comm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ s₃ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter (Inter.inter s₁ s₂) s₃) (Inter.inter (Inter.inter s₁ s₃) s₂)
decl:
theorem inter_right_comm (s₁ s₂ s₃ : Finset α) : s₁ ∩ s₂ ∩ s₃ = s₁ ∩ s₃ ∩ s₂ :=
  ext fun _ => by simp only [mem_inter, and_right_comm]

name: Finset.inter_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s s) s
decl:
@[simp]
theorem inter_self (s : Finset α) : s ∩ s = s :=
  ext fun _ => mem_inter.trans <| and_self_iff

name: Finset.inter_union_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s (Union.union t s)) s
decl:
@[simp]
theorem inter_union_self (s t : Finset α) : s ∩ (t ∪ s) = s := by
  rw [inter_comm, union_inter_cancel_right]

name: Finset.inter_subset_inter
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
x y s t : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset x y
h' : HasSubset.Subset s t
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter x s) (Inter.inter y t)
decl:
@[mono, gcongr]
theorem inter_subset_inter {x y s t : Finset α} (h : x ⊆ y) (h' : s ⊆ t) : x ∩ s ⊆ y ∩ t := by
  intro a a_in
  rw [Finset.mem_inter] at a_in ⊢
  exact ⟨h a_in.1, h' a_in.2⟩

name: Finset.inter_subset_inter_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset t u
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s t) (Inter.inter s u)
decl:
@[gcongr]
theorem inter_subset_inter_left (h : t ⊆ u) : s ∩ t ⊆ s ∩ u :=
  inter_subset_inter Subset.rfl h

name: Finset.inter_subset_inter_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset s t
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s u) (Inter.inter t u)
decl:
@[gcongr]
theorem inter_subset_inter_right (h : s ⊆ t) : s ∩ u ⊆ t ∩ u :=
  inter_subset_inter h Subset.rfl

name: Finset.inter_subset_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s t) (Union.union s t)
decl:
theorem inter_subset_union : s ∩ t ⊆ s ∪ t :=
  le_iff_subset.1 inf_le_sup

name: Finset.union_left_idem
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union s (Union.union s t)) (Union.union s t)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem union_left_idem (s t : Finset α) : s ∪ (s ∪ t) = s ∪ t := sup_left_idem _ _

name: Finset.union_right_idem
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union (Union.union s t) t) (Union.union s t)
decl: theorem union_right_idem (s t : Finset α) : s ∪ t ∪ t = s ∪ t := sup_right_idem _ _

name: Finset.union_subset_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Iff (HasSubset.Subset (Union.union s t) u) (And (HasSubset.Subset s u) (HasSubset.Subset t u))
decl:
theorem union_subset_iff : s ∪ t ⊆ u ↔ s ⊆ u ∧ t ⊆ u :=
  (sup_le_iff : s ⊔ t ≤ u ↔ s ≤ u ∧ t ≤ u)

name: Finset.subset_inter_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Iff (HasSubset.Subset s (Inter.inter t u)) (And (HasSubset.Subset s t) (HasSubset.Subset s u))
decl:
theorem subset_inter_iff : s ⊆ t ∩ u ↔ s ⊆ t ∧ s ⊆ u :=
  (le_inf_iff : s ≤ t ⊓ u ↔ s ≤ t ∧ s ≤ u)

name: Finset.inter_eq_left

inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (Inter.inter s t) s) (HasSubset.Subset s t)
decl: @[simp] lemma inter_eq_left : s ∩ t = s ↔ s ⊆ t := inf_eq_left

name: Finset.inter_eq_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (Inter.inter t s) s) (HasSubset.Subset s t)
decl: @[simp] lemma inter_eq_right : t ∩ s = s ↔ s ⊆ t := inf_eq_right

name: Finset.inter_congr_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
ht : HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s u) t
hu : HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s t) u
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s t) (Inter.inter s u)
decl:
theorem inter_congr_left (ht : s ∩ u ⊆ t) (hu : s ∩ t ⊆ u) : s ∩ t = s ∩ u :=
  inf_congr_left ht hu

name: Finset.inter_congr_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
hs : HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter t u) s
ht : HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s u) t
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s u) (Inter.inter t u)
decl:
theorem inter_congr_right (hs : t ∩ u ⊆ s) (ht : s ∩ u ⊆ t) : s ∩ u = t ∩ u :=
  inf_congr_right hs ht

name: Finset.inter_eq_inter_iff_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (Inter.inter s t) (Inter.inter s u)) (And (HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s u) t) (HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s t) u))
decl:
theorem inter_eq_inter_iff_left : s ∩ t = s ∩ u ↔ s ∩ u ⊆ t ∧ s ∩ t ⊆ u :=
  inf_eq_inf_iff_left

name: Finset.inter_eq_inter_iff_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (Inter.inter s u) (Inter.inter t u)) (And (HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter t u) s) (HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s u) t))
decl:
theorem inter_eq_inter_iff_right : s ∩ u = t ∩ u ↔ t ∩ u ⊆ s ∧ s ∩ u ⊆ t :=
  inf_eq_inf_iff_right

name: Finset.ite_subset_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : DecidableEq α
s s' : Finset α
P : Prop
inst✝ : Decidable P
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (ite P s s') (Union.union s s')
decl:
theorem ite_subset_union (s s' : Finset α) (P : Prop) [Decidable P] : ite P s s' ⊆ s ∪ s' :=
  ite_le_sup s s' P

name: Finset.inter_subset_ite
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : DecidableEq α
s s' : Finset α
P : Prop
inst✝ : Decidable P
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (Inter.inter s s') (ite P s s')
decl:
theorem inter_subset_ite (s s' : Finset α) (P : Prop) [Decidable P] : s ∩ s' ⊆ ite P s s' :=
  inf_le_ite s s' P
